text: For this is what the Lord GOD says: â€˜Behold, I will bring against Tyre from the north Nebuchadnezzar 26:7 Hebrew Nebuchadrezzar, a variant of Nebuchadnezzar (king of Babylon). The latter spelling is used throughout Ezekiel for consistency. king of Babylon, king of kings, with horses and chariots, with cavalry and a great company of troops.
